structure.unit: Tax On The Storage, Use Or Other Consumption Of Certain Tangible Personal Property

law.text: Upon each sale of tangible personal property or services taxable under the provisions of this chapter the amount of tax collected by the vendor from the purchaser under the provisions of this chapter shall be stated and charged separately from the sales price and shown separately on any record thereof at the time the sale is made, or on any evidence of sale issued or used by the vendor.
